title: Authors and Citation
text: Galal H (2023). nansen: UNHCR’s Refugee Population Statistics Database. R package version 2022.06.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {nansen: UNHCR’s Refugee Population Statistics Database},   author = {Hisham Galal},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 2022.06.0}, }

title: UNHCR’s Refugee Population Statistics Database
text: UNHCR’s Refugee Data Finder contains information forcibly displaced populations spanning across almost 70 years statistical activities. covers displaced populations refugees, asylum-seekers internally displaced persons, including demographics. Stateless persons also included, never displaced. database also reflects different types solutions displaced populations repatriation resettlement. data available refugee statistics website associated mobile app. Details relating data collation, storage, definitions available methodology section website.

title: Asylum Applications — asylum_applications
text: Asylum claims submitted year countries asylum origin. Claims submitted asylum applicants applications international protection.

title: Asylum Applications — asylum_applications
text: tibble. year year (e.g. 2020). coo_name Country origin name. coo Country origin UNHCR code. coo_iso Country origin ISO code. coa_name Country asylum name. coa Country asylum UNHCR code. coa_iso Country asylum ISO code. procedure_type procedure type describes authority asylum claim lodged.  can one : G – Government, J - Joint, U – UNHCR. app_type application type describes stage procedure.  Common values N (New), R (Repeat) (Appeal). dec_level decision level provides detail stage procedure.  Common values NA (New applications), RA (repeat/reopened applications)  AR (administrative review). app_pc data type describes whether data provided reflects cases persons.  common situation data asylum applications lodged reflect persons,  certain situations (e.g USA), data provided governments level cases.  case can contain information one persons. applied total number asylum claims given dataset.

title: Asylum Applications — asylum_applications
text: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.

title: Asylum Applications — asylum_applications
text: See notes data structure methodology pages details.

title: Asylum Applications — asylum_applications
code: asylum_applications #> # A tibble: 100,750 × 12 #>     year coo_name   coo   coo_iso coa_name coa   coa_iso procedure_type app_type #>    <dbl> <chr>      <chr> <chr>   <chr>    <chr> <chr>   <chr>          <chr>    #>  1  2006 Afghanist… AFG   AFG     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #>  2  2006 Albania    ALB   ALB     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #>  3  2006 Algeria    ALG   DZA     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #>  4  2006 Egypt      ARE   EGY     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #>  5  2006 Bahrain    BAH   BHR     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #>  6  2006 Bangladesh BGD   BGD     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #>  7  2006 Belarus    BLR   BLR     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #>  8  2006 Brazil     BRA   BRA     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #>  9  2006 Bulgaria   BUL   BGR     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #> 10  2006 Cambodia   CAM   KHM     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              A        #> # ℹ 100,740 more rows #> # ℹ 3 more variables: dec_level <chr>, app_pc <chr>, applied <dbl>

title: Asylum Decisions — asylum_decisions
text: Decisions taken asylum claims year countries asylum origin. Asylum claims applications international protection decisions asylum claimscan positive, negative otherwise closed.

title: Asylum Decisions — asylum_decisions
text: tibble. year year (e.g. 2020). coo_name Country origin name. coo Country origin UNHCR code. coo_iso Country origin ISO code. coa_name Country asylum name. coa Country asylum UNHCR code. coa_iso Country asylum ISO code. procedure_type procedure type describes authority asylum claim lodged.  can one : G – Government, J - Joint, U – UNHCR. dec_level decision level provides detail stage procedure.  Common values NA (New applications), RA (repeat/reopened applications)  AR (administrative review). dec_pc data type describes whether data provided reflects cases persons.  common situation data asylum applications lodged reflect persons,  certain situations (e.g USA), data provided governments level cases.  case can contain information one persons. dec_recognized number asylum applicants recognised refugees UNHCR’s mandate. dec_other number asylum applicants recognised refugees forms complementary protection. dec_rejected number asylum applicants whose asylum claims rejected. dec_closed number asylum applicants whose asylum claims otherwise closed. dec_total total number asylum applicants decision asylum claim  made given reference period.

title: Asylum Decisions — asylum_decisions
text: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.

title: Asylum Decisions — asylum_decisions
text: See notes data structure methodology pages details.

title: Asylum Decisions — asylum_decisions
code: asylum_decisions #> # A tibble: 95,806 × 15 #>     year coo_name  coo   coo_iso coa_name coa   coa_iso procedure_type dec_level #>    <dbl> <chr>     <chr> <chr>   <chr>    <chr> <chr>   <chr>          <chr>     #>  1  2000 Afghanis… AFG   AFG     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #>  2  2000 Albania   ALB   ALB     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #>  3  2000 Algeria   ALG   DZA     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #>  4  2000 Egypt     ARE   EGY     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #>  5  2000 Armenia   ARM   ARM     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #>  6  2000 Banglade… BGD   BGD     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #>  7  2000 Brazil    BRA   BRA     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #>  8  2000 Bosnia a… BSN   BIH     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #>  9  2000 Bulgaria  BUL   BGR     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #> 10  2000 Cambodia  CAM   KHM     Austral… AUL   AUS     G              AR        #> # ℹ 95,796 more rows #> # ℹ 6 more variables: dec_pc <chr>, dec_recognized <dbl>, dec_other <dbl>, #> #   dec_rejected <dbl>, dec_closed <dbl>, dec_total <dbl>

title: Countries — countries
text: Country codes, names, UN major areas UNHCR regional bureaux/operations.

title: Countries — countries
text: tibble. iso_code ISO3 Country code. unhcr_code UNHCR Country code. name UNSD Name. unhcr_region UNHCR Region name. unsd_region UNSD Region name. unsd_subregion UNSD Sub-region name. unsd_imregion SDG Region name. sdg_region SDG Region name.

title: Countries — countries
text: Table 22 annexed Global Trends 2020 report.

title: Demographics — demographics
text: Demographic sub-national data, disaggregation available. UNHCR collects information population types, well two durable solutions (returned IDPs refugees). Demographics also available IDMC UNRWA datasets.

title: Demographics — demographics
text: tibble. year year (e.g. 2020). coo_name Country origin name. coo Country origin UNHCR code. coo_iso Country origin ISO code. coa_name Country asylum name. coa Country asylum UNHCR code. coa_iso Country asylum ISO code. f_0_4 number female children aged 0 4 inclusive. f_5_11 number female children aged 5 11 inclusive. f_12_17 number female children aged 12 17 inclusive. f_18_59 number female adults aged 18 59 inclusive. f_60 number female adults aged 60 . f_other number females age disaggregation unavailable. f_total total number females (disaggregation sex available). m_0_4 number male children aged 0 4 inclusive. m_5_11 number male children aged 5 11 inclusive. m_12_17 number male children aged 12 17 inclusive. m_18_59 number male adults aged 18 59 inclusive. m_60 number male adults aged 60 . m_other number males age disaggregation unavailable. m_total total number males (disaggregation sex available). total total number persons.

title: Demographics — demographics
text: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.

title: Demographics — demographics
text: See notes data structure methodology pages details.

title: Demographics — demographics
code: demographics #> # A tibble: 91,741 × 22 #>     year coo_name      coo   coo_iso coa_name coa   coa_iso f_0_4 f_5_11 f_12_17 #>    <dbl> <chr>         <chr> <chr>   <chr>    <chr> <chr>   <dbl>  <dbl>   <dbl> #>  1  2001 Afghanistan   AFG   AFG     Afghani… AFG   AFG         0      0       0 #>  2  2001 Iran (Islami… IRN   IRN     Afghani… AFG   AFG         0      0       0 #>  3  2001 Iraq          IRQ   IRQ     Afghani… AFG   AFG         0      5       0 #>  4  2001 Iraq          IRQ   IRQ     Albania  ALB   ALB         0      0       0 #>  5  2001 North Macedo… MCD   MKD     Albania  ALB   ALB         0      0       0 #>  6  2001 Serbia and K… SRB   SRB     Albania  ALB   ALB        14     20      18 #>  7  2001 Türkiye       TUR   TUR     Albania  ALB   ALB         0      0       0 #>  8  2001 Chad          CHD   TCD     Algeria  ALG   DZA         0      0       0 #>  9  2001 Cameroon      CMR   CMR     Algeria  ALG   DZA         0      0       0 #> 10  2001 Congo         COB   COG     Algeria  ALG   DZA         0      0       0 #> # ℹ 91,731 more rows #> # ℹ 12 more variables: f_18_59 <dbl>, f_60 <dbl>, f_other <dbl>, f_total <dbl>, #> #   m_0_4 <dbl>, m_5_11 <dbl>, m_12_17 <dbl>, m_18_59 <dbl>, m_60 <dbl>, #> #   m_other <dbl>, m_total <dbl>, total <dbl>

title: IDMC Data — idmc
text: Data Internally displaced persons due conflict violence produced Internal Displacement Monitoring Centre.

title: IDMC Data — idmc
text: tibble. year year (e.g. 2020). coo_name Country origin name. coo Country origin UNHCR code. coo_iso Country origin ISO code. coa_name Country asylum name. coa Country asylum UNHCR code. coa_iso Country asylum ISO code. total total number internally displaced persons due conflict violence.

title: IDMC Data — idmc
text: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.

title: IDMC Data — idmc
text: See notes data structure methodology pages details.

title: IDMC Data — idmc
code: solutions #> # A tibble: 18,701 × 11 #>     year coo_name coo   coo_iso coa_name coa   coa_iso returned_refugees #>    <dbl> <chr>    <chr> <chr>   <chr>    <chr> <chr>               <dbl> #>  1  1959 Albania  ALB   ALB     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #>  2  1959 Egypt    ARE   EGY     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #>  3  1959 Austria  AUS   AUT     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #>  4  1959 Bulgaria BUL   BGR     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #>  5  1959 Czechia  CZE   CZE     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #>  6  1959 Estonia  EST   EST     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #>  7  1959 Finland  FIN   FIN     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #>  8  1959 Germany  GFR   DEU     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #>  9  1959 Greece   GRE   GRC     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #> 10  1959 Hungary  HUN   HUN     Canada   CAN   CAN                    NA #> # ℹ 18,691 more rows #> # ℹ 3 more variables: resettlement <dbl>, naturalisation <dbl>, #> #   returned_idps <dbl>

what: nansen: UNHCR’s Refugee Population Statistics Database — nansen-package
title: nansen: UNHCR’s Refugee Population Statistics Database — nansen-package
text: database contains information forcibly displaced populations spanning 70 years statistical activities. covers displaced populations refugees, asylum-seekers internally displaced people, including demographics. Stateless people also included, never displaced. database also reflects different types solutions displaced populations repatriation resettlement.

title: nansen: UNHCR’s Refugee Population Statistics Database — nansen-package
text: Maintainer: Hisham Galal galal@unhcr.org contributors: Ahmadou Dicko mail@ahmadoudicko.com [contributor] UNHCR [copyright holder]

title: Population figures — population
text: UNHCR data displacement end year.

title: Population figures — population
text: tibble. year year (e.g. 2020). coo_name Country origin name. coo Country origin UNHCR code. coo_iso Country origin ISO code. coa_name Country asylum name. coa Country asylum UNHCR code. coa_iso Country asylum ISO code. refugees number refugees. asylum_seekers number asyum-seekers. returned_refugees number returned refugees. idps number internally displaced persons. returned_idps number returned internally displaced persons. stateless number stateless persons. ooc number others concern UNHCR. oip number people need international protection. hst number host community members.

title: Population figures — population
text: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.

title: Population figures — population
text: See notes data structure methodology pages details.

title: Population figures — population
code: population #> # A tibble: 120,261 × 16 #>     year coo_name coo   coo_iso coa_name   coa   coa_iso refugees asylum_seekers #>    <dbl> <chr>    <chr> <chr>   <chr>      <chr> <chr>      <dbl>          <dbl> #>  1  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      Australia  AUL   AUS       180000              0 #>  2  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      Austria    AUS   AUT       282000              0 #>  3  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      Belgium    BEL   BEL        55000              0 #>  4  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      Canada     CAN   CAN       168511              0 #>  5  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      Denmark    DEN   DNK         2000              0 #>  6  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      France     FRA   FRA       290000              0 #>  7  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      United Ki… GBR   GBR       208000              0 #>  8  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      Germany    GFR   DEU       265000              0 #>  9  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      Greece     GRE   GRC        18000              0 #> 10  1951 Unknown  UKN   NA      China, Ho… HKG   HKG        30000              0 #> # ℹ 120,251 more rows #> # ℹ 7 more variables: returned_refugees <dbl>, idps <dbl>, returned_idps <dbl>, #> #   stateless <dbl>, ooc <dbl>, oip <dbl>, hst <dbl>

title: Solutions — solutions
text: Data solutions record refugees IDPs availed durable solution.

title: Solutions — solutions
text: tibble. year year (e.g. 2020). coo_name Country origin name. coo Country origin UNHCR code. coo_iso Country origin ISO code. coa_name Country asylum name. coa Country asylum UNHCR code. coa_iso Country asylum ISO code. returned_refugees number refugee returnees. resettlement number resettlement arrivals. naturalisation number refugees naturalised. returned_idps number IDP returnees.

text: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.

title: Solutions — solutions
text: See notes data structure methodology pages details.

title: UNRWA data — unrwa
text: Data Palestine refugees registered UNRWA’s mandate.

title: UNRWA data — unrwa
text: tibble. year year (e.g. 2020). coo_name Country origin name. coo Country origin UNHCR code. coo_iso Country origin ISO code. coa_name Country asylum name. coa Country asylum UNHCR code. coa_iso Country asylum ISO code. total total number Palestine refugees registered UNRWA’s mandate.

text: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.

title: UNRWA data — unrwa
text: See notes data structure methodology pages details.
